app_description: Have you ever wanted or needed to communicate with someone who didn t speak your language Vocre breaks down the language barrier and brings us all closer no matter where we are or what language we speak. App Features Fun and easy way to have a conversation with someone who speaks a different language. Perfect travel companion. It works quickly allowing you to understand and be understood almost anywhere on Earth. Gives people the ability to talk to anyone in any language. Our world is full of people worth talking to. Now nothing is holding you back. Supported Languages Countries: Arabic Catalan Chinese Cantonese Hong Kong Chinese Mandarin China Chinese Mandarin Taiwan Czech Danish Dutch English Finnish French German Greek Hebrew Hindi Hungarian Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Malay no voice output Norwegian Nynorsk Polish Portuguese Romanian Russian Slovak Spanish Swedish Sweden Thai Turkish Ukrainian no voice output Vietnamese no voice output Text Only : Afrikaans Albanian Armenian Azerbaijani Bangla Basque Belarusian Bulgarian Croatian Estonian Galician Georgian Gujarati Haitian Creole Icelandic Irish Khmer Kurdish Latin Latvian Lithuanian Macedonian Maltese Nepali Persian Punjabi Serbian Slovenian Swahili Tagalog Tamil Telugu Urdu Welsh Yiddish Vocre is in active development and we value our users feedback. Contact us in app via email and let us know your thoughts. Requires an Internet connection 3G 4G or WiFi in order to perform translations. Terms of use: https: app.vocre.com termsofuse Privacy Policy: https: app.vocre.com privacy
